subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Loved by some for his aggressive play and disliked by others for his celebratory style, the Dodgers’ Yasiel Puig has fascinated fans with his hitting, mental gaffes, benchings and shadowy defection from Cuba.
snippet: Loved by some for his aggressive play and disliked by others for his celebratory style, the Dodgers’ Yasiel Puig has fascinated fans with his hitting, mental gaffes, benchings and shadowy defection from Cuba.
